flawed_nl_solution:
The town used to emit 8000 pounds of carbon a year because 80 x 10 = <<80*10=8000>>8000
20 now take the bus because 80 x 0.25 = <<80*0.25=20>>20
60 people still drive because 80 - 20 = <<80-20=60>>60
Those 60 people create 600 pounds of carbon because 60 x 10 = <<60*10=600>>600
The town now emits 700 pounds of carbon because 100 + 600 = <<100+600=700>>700
The town emits 7300 fewer pounds of carbon now because 8000 - 700 = <<8000-700=7300>>7300
#### 7300

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 8000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
